content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving home from salem nh to hudson nh on route 111 west.

2. the sky was perfectly clear, temperature 68f. no clouds. as we pilots say, "cavu" (clear above visibility unlimited). then i saw a a streak in the sky, but as a commercially-rated pilot who had grown up with airplane all my life, a cool day like today - or really any day, at that altitude - would have left a contrail if it was any kind of airplane. but there was absolutely no contrail; just an orange streak that followed the object, and did not lengthen, ever. the size of the streak from my perspective was about an inch; i have no way of telling how high the object was. the streak eventually shortened as the object continued on past my line of sight, indicating to me that the object was holding altitude, not falling. 

3. i originally though it was an asteroid or meteor; i could not tell if it ever made contact with the earth. but it looked propelled; every time i though that it would break up, it just kept going.

4. i personally thing that i saw the object make some slight left-hand turns, but it was high enough that i cannot be certain. 

5. i originally thought that this was a meteor or asteroid, but it clearly maintained speed, and eventually moved past my line of sight - which on that road, happened to be excellent. i have never written to you before, but whatever this was - it was clearly not a meteor or asteroid. however, it could definitely be of man-made origin. i just would like to know.

6. as per above, it maintained speed or accelerated beyond my line of sight. which is why i know it was not a meteor or asteroid; it clearly did not decelerate or lose altitude. 

i just want to know if anyone else saw the same thing, or if it was reported on radar. to me, it was headed from nh to vermont, and then probably to new york. like i said, i'm a pilot; i have a ph.D. in chemistry, so i have a piece of paper that says i'm a scientist; this was no airplane nor meteor/asteroid. so what was it that blew through the sky leaving a trail at such an altitude (estimated >50,000 feet or even much higher)? i was going to try to take a video but it moved too quickly. i very much hope you'll reply. thank you.
content.summary: I did not see the object in detail, it was too high. but it was clearly an object with a trail

content.detailedDescription:
At 3:40 today, i was outside my workplace in syracuse for a cigarette break.  i was looking at the peculiar banded cloud formations that are unusual for this area.  i sighted an object that could have been a jet at high altitude, moving toward a cloud bank.  i could not observe any wings on it, and as it moved behind the cloud, i got out my pocked camera (mini u8 hd spy cam) and began shooting video where i expected to see the object emerge from the clouds.  i got nearly 30 seconds video of the object when it emerged, before it went behind more clouds and disappeared from view.  it had a uniform vector and speed during my observation.  later, when i got the video on the computer, i was able to capture some zoomed-in still frames, and at no point are there any visual indications of wings.  it simply looks like a bright white cigar-shape or disc, in some frames more circular like and "orb".  

this is the same location as my most recent report, as i usually look at the skies when i'm outside of my workplace on a cigarette break.  but this time, i got some video.

my eyesight is not great, and the video is only a little better, but i zoomed some frames, and i can't see anything that even hints at wings on it.
content.summary: Didn't see wings, so i took a video

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside around 1am and in the clear sky were 7 white lights in a v formation.
i thought maybe it was a stealth bomber but it made no sound, and was about as far from me as a jet airliner.  it continues flying about the speed of a plane in a straight line going west then suddenly all the lights plot apart and flew different directions very quickly like fireflies! 
i couldn't believe my eyes and my adrenaline instantly begin to increase and heart beating fast...I was alone but at that moment someone came outside and just as i told him what i had seen, two of the crafts re entered our sight line of the sky (we were outside between other buildings) that were still flying erratic and super fast for a few seconds and they were gone.   i was glad to return after telling him what i saw, he believed me after that.
his reaction was the same as mine...." what the hell is that!?"
content.summary: 7 ufos  over san francisco

content.detailedDescription: Me and three of my friends were outside on my driveway when we noticed an orb or sphere glowing. i was the first to see it then it glowed around four more times before disappearing. when it would glow it seemed as thought it was powering up because it would start off faint then it would get bright then fall off again. each episode lasted around 15 seconds. on the last and brightest episode i did notice a small red/orange light color located inside the orb. the object didn't seem to move and if it did it was slight but it way up in the sky so it was hard to tell if it moved.
content.summary: Witnessed 5 pulses of lights then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We noticed the white object in our photo 2 days after we took it. not a cloud in the sky at devils tower when we took the picture.
content.summary: Noticed it in the photo we took 2 days later

content.detailedDescription: I took my sick dog out to potty at 4:05am on 10/12/2015. the sky was clear and the stars were out. then 3 what i thought were stars in a triangular shape started moving together. i watched a minute and realized i couldn't see the stars within the triangle. i watch a minute and when i realized what i had seen, i grabbed my dog and ran inside and locked the door. i didn't sleep the rest of the night.
content.summary: I took my sick dog out to potty at 4:05am on 10/12/2015. the sky was clear and the stars were out. then 3 what i thought were stars in a triangular shape started moving together. i watched a minute and realized i couldn't see the stars within the triangle

content.detailedDescription: Avid sky watcher ~ this is not the first time spotting these objects over colorado. constantly trying to figure them out. started out just as bright light that stays lit then goes dim. objects hover then move east, then se, then directly south. they get extremely bright and then dim and move. and repeat as they move. the area in which they move in the sky seems to be limited in an area of about as far as you can open your arms against the sky. as you will loose these objects in about 25 minutes to 1 hr. i ignore objects that just go in straight lines as i chalk them up to jets or satellites. i also ignore objects that just burst one bright light as exploding stars. but if the object moves , hovers and changes direction multiple times i lock in on it. using my plain eyes first then move in with my barska 10x30x50 binoculars. these objects when seen are not moving fast, but noticeably across a section of sky. always seem to find a second or third nearby. use to think they dim out until i got my binoculars on them...They do not they just are much dimmer to see. currently seeing them in north west sky or straight up above me. seen a few this month in north east sky near and passing through the w-shaped constellation cassiopeia. objects seen also on no moon nights as it's easier seeing the sky and tracking them with naked eye and binoculars. these objects are very high up in the sky. at least satellite distance but lower than the stars. but it is hard to judge on that. any avid colorado skywatcher should be able to see these objects and watch them as they get super bright and dim as you can tract them moving across the sky and changing direction quickly as they never really dim all the way out. but you do need binoculars or you will loose them quickly in the night sky as they change direction or hover going super bright then dim. i would love any feedback on what these possible could be ! my guess it will all be conjecture because they got me stumped !
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object would be stationary, also moving slowly, changing directions, two identical objects in area.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the dog and i was just walking along looking ahead at the sky and saw a cyan ball really bright it then dropped ima arc with a tail behind it and it dropped below houses so i couldn't see it anymore. right after it happened i felt light headed and dizy but i'm not sure why but when i got home and chilled i was fine.
content.summary: Cyan ball hovering and it then dropped in a arc with a tail behind it it dropped below house level so i couldn't see it

content.detailedDescription:
Good evening..

i enclose a photo made by me to try out my new camera


a canon powershot sx 60hs bought three days before.



i photographed the moon and then after a few minutes, when i went to review the pictures i have seen that there is "something to the right of the moon"

the quality is not excellent, but my curiosity much. you will surely have the software to increase the image quality.

the photo was taken monday, september 21 at approximately 21:25 in rome, via tiburtina.


thanks for the attention

sorry for my poor english.
content.summary: A light near the moon

content.detailedDescription:
On september 29, 30 2015 i was sitting on my back porch visiting with family. im not sure exactly the time but it was about 45 min to an hour after dark. i started noticing what i thought were flashes, but only seen them peripherally. so i paid more attention and observed more intensely, then noticed and was able to see these flashes and point them out to my family. 
at that time we were facing west with a small patch of sky. we then decided to move to the front porch, which faces north east. we then were able to see over30 different flashes some at the same time. the flashes re-apeared over and over for 30 min.
the next night i was in oroville, ca, and told my friend of the lights. he didn't really believe my story, but was interested. so he had an idea to use his high power laser pointer. shortly after poining the laser towards the night sky we started noticing the exact flashes i just told him about. that lasted about 15 min. i have a small video but wouldnt be good proof or evidence.
content.summary: On september 25, & 26, 20015 my family and i witnessed 30+ flashes throughout a 20-30min. time span.

content.detailedDescription: Back in july my daughter and i were star gazing on my porch in northern mi,..Around 11pm on a clear night, i pointed my lazer {one flash} at cluster of stars in the lower west sky an received a slow flash back,  repeated this several times and received slow flash of light like a star in sequence of my lazer...This went on for a couple of minutes then stopped...My daughter and i thought this was very strange.....Oct 11, warm clear night around 11pm grabbed my lazer pointer and flashed it once at same cluster of stars as in july  and received a slow flash of light like a star on a dimmer switch,repeated this with 2 then 3 flashes from my hand lazer and received in sequence 2 then 3 slow flashes back,then object started to move and slow flash to the southwest and slowly faded away..I would like to point out this light was slow flashing in a stationary position for several minutes before it started to move and at one point i went into the house to see if i could video it on my notebook camera but that didn't work.I got the feeling that this thing reacted to my lazer pointer then decided to leave area.....I will follow up on this strange light on the next clear night...Thankyou.....
content.summary: Repeated light sequence from my had held lazer pointer

content.detailedDescription:
I had just returned from grocery shopping around 8:25pm on 10/11/15 and was putting away canned goods when my husband called me into the darkened living room to see strange lights to the west.  we keep the lights out in the living area after putting our infant twins to 'bed' in their pack n play at 8pm. thus it was dark enough to see outside pretty well, without our eyes needing adjustment to the darkness .  the neighbors directly behind our house had a porch light on and i could not see at first to what he was referring .  but using that light as a reference, he noted (what at first could easily be mistaken for a low star or an airplane) a pulsing lighted object.  my husband lost interest quickly as it was not in our immediate area.  i however kept watching-waiting for the object/lights to change direction or appear closer.  that never happened.  it appeared to be miles away, yet i could clearly see a lit circular (possibly spherical) object with rotating/pulsating lateral red and blue lights.  it was about a three-count pulse.  it was far enough away i could not decipher detailed shape, markings or sound.  but the white light seemed to brighten when either the red or blue light pulsed, lightening up haze around it.
after a few minutes i realized the object was not on an easterly path towards our home as i thought (like perhaps an aircraft on a straight path).  it came no closer and simply hovered.  'helicopter perhaps?' i remember thinking.; 'an inadviseable nighttime ultra-light aircraft in flight?' maybe.  but then after watching for 15 minutes i decided that, no, this was not a police or emergency helicopter that would be capable of hovering for an extended time.  it just seemed 'strange'-that is, not normal behavior for aircraft in our area.
i was giving this byplay to my husband the whole time.  at one point i heard movement from one of my twins and looked away from the object towards them.  as i looked back the object was gone-leaving no sign in the sky that it was ever there.  i looked frantically around for it in another part of the sky, but to no avail.
content.summary: Two adults witnessed (from darkened interior house) stationary lights in westerly direction for approximately 15min, no change in direction, speed or location.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a fireball object in the sky.  it was bright and firey orange. we watched it fly by and completely disapear withing approxamately 30 to 45 seconds.(much faster than an airplane)  it had no sound.  it also did not have a long tail on it which may have made me think it was a meteor.  as we were all talking about what we had just seen,  we noticed another one that seemed slightly closer but repeated the same path as the first one.  we then compared the speed at which it passed by with that of some airplanes that were also in the sky and it was much much faster.  not even comparable.
content.summary: Saw a fireball object fly by and completely disapear withing approxamately 30 to 45 seconds.(much faster than an airplane) no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
what i experienced was so crazy and unreal i started to question my sanity. if it had not been for my fiance' seeing it too i would have gone to a doctor. he seen it first actually, and pointed out to me.
   around 2am my fiance', and i stepped outside our home to have a cigarette. the sky was very clear and beautiful this night and the stars were shinning everywhere. he stepped off the porch and went left toward our car and way way up in the sky out of his peripherals, he saw an abnormally bright light. at first we thought it may have been a really bright star. but this was brighter than any star i've ever seen. (other than the sun obviously). then we saw a hint of red and green lights coming from it. it was very faint thought. then i suggested it may be an airplane, but as we watched it, it seemed to hover. i then told him its a star burning out or something to that nature (i know nothing about the subject but it was way more logical than a ufo). it did seem to get smaller and dimmer and i assumed the guessing game was over and we would go back in. however, as we were watching it slowly fade away, it seemed to "turn around" in the sky. the way the lights motioned in the sky, it was like a car making a turn at night with the lights on. it then started to get brighter and bigger. it looked like it was coming right for us. it was so far away though we couldn't make out a shape. it just kind of looked like a star with a faint aura coming at us. then it stopped and just hovered in the sky, as if looking at us. and we were like deer in headlights, waiting for it to move again, but it just sat there. i went back inside not entertained by it anymore. i just thought to myself "it's something that's either causing an illusion and playing with our minds, or its an airplane. i've seen a couple of those ufo shows. it's always something logical and realistic." i am not a believer. 
    my fiance' on the other hand was amazed and convinced from the very beginning that it was a ufo and "aliens" were watching us now. so, he was walking outside every few minutes to look at it and "tease" it with a flashlight. he tried to tell me that it was spinning and moving, but i ignored him and told him he was imagining it and irritating me with all that nonsense. he came in a few minutes later and i asked him to stop trying to justify why it has to be a ufo and i explained to him that it was impossible. there's now such thing. it was ignorance to me.
      about an hour later he decided to go see if it was gone. he stepped outside and immediately stuck his head in the door demanding i come look. i went outside and the light was still there but in a completely different spot. it was still to far away to make a shape but it had moved were you could see it up in the sky as you got off the porch straight ahead and not to the left anymore. i still wasn't amused. i assumed it was rotating with the stars. "stars move every night, so what" were my words to him. i went back in. im not real sure how much time had passed but maybe somewhere between 30 minutes to an our later, we stepped outside again for another cigarette. this is where i kind of began to get a little curios... the light was back around the area it was the first time, which was to the left as you step off the porch. i remember thinking "since when do stars backtrack". i'm trying hard  now to think of something realistic; at least realistic to me. i was about to jump on google to find an explanation but  as i'm looking at it i begin to notice some movement. i couldn't see it real well at first because right behind my car was a street light and it was making it harder to see what the object was doing. i decided to put my sunglasses on and look to block out the street light. that is when i noticed the movement he was talking about. the way it was moving seemed like it was deliberate, like it wanted to get our attention. i could see the lights bobbing up and down first, then side to side and right back toward me. the was it looked actually reminded me of headlights. then it made a circle. i could see the lights turning and then come back around, as if it were a lighthouse. after seeing an object in the sky moving like this, i began to get excited and nervous all at the same time. i remember saying "this can't be real" and smiling from absolute disbelief that i have let some illusion warp me to "think" i am seeing this.
    it started moving left to right and up and down as if playing and i swear every movement made me believe more and more this this thing had headlights like a car. i also saw the red and green colors just a little more. the red lights looked like they were on the sides of it much like an airplane except they looked like beams of light and did not flash like an airplane. the green light was strange to me. i barely could see it it was so faint. but what i was able to see looked like it was like a thicker beam. it seemed controlled. kind of like you see in the crazy movies. the object would turn slightly and i could just see a faint green light come on and then off. it would turn again and the light would come on then go off. it looked like it was scanning sections the sky to make sure everything was in place or it may have been searching for something. or it may have been a figment of my imagination. that would make more sense believe me i know.  
   we didn't see all of this in one setting. it was a little chilly so we would watch for a little while and go inside to warm up. every time we came back out it had jumped from here to there, back and forth. sometimes it was a big jump others it was just a little. but always back and forth. it also never seemed to go any higher into the sky or lower. when it would start to fade away it seemed like it just simply turned around and went the other direction. the highest and lowest it got was the small up and down bobbing like gesture it did. 
    the real action happened when we were leaving to take him to work. it was short lived but scary for a second. we got in the car to leave around 5:30am. when we were pulling out of the driveway we stopped at the end of it to get one last good look. daylight was coming and we knew we wouldn't see it again. as we were looking, it seemed to fade away yet again. getting smaller and smaller. then all of a sudden the car-like "headlights" turned  and there it was coming at us. it was getting bigger and bigger...So big i began to get a little scared so i pulled off. (when i say big i mean the size of the light. please understand i didn't see a definite shape or really good detail of it because it was really far away, it was just extremely bright. the lights and movement are the only detail i could see.)  we kept an eye on it on the way to his work. we wanted to show it to his co workers. as we were driving, i guess it stopped "coming at us" because it seemed to go back to it's normal size. it didn't seem so close anymore. we pulled up to his job and was looking out at it, getting ready to show it to some of his friends...But it wasn't moving anymore. just hovering. and it did not move again. as the sun rose, it faded with the stars. i'm sure we will be back outside tonight to see if this mysterious light returns. 
         i really hope this makes sense. it is really hard to explain because it's just off the wall to me. i gave every detail as i remember it. i felt like i was writing a science fiction book as i was typing this. i feel crazy for even typing this because i never saw an actual object; i basically only seen lights. if my fiance' had not seen the same thing as me, i would swear i was hallucinating and go to a doctor. i really wish i had videoed it. it was amazing and scary all at the same time. im not sure it would have shown up very well on a video anyways. i could tell it had some sort of shape but it was so far away i couldn't really tell. the lights are what i saw. i imagine what i saw to be like what the three wise men saw when they seen the north star and was following it. that's the best reference i can think of. if this ends up being something "realistic" like i said in the beginning i am going to feel so stupid for actually thinking "maybe..."
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object would go up and down and and move back and forth in the sky get close and move back.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i had received permission to take some night time photography at grandview cemetery in chillicothe. we had just finished up and were walking back to our vehicle when i noticed something streaking in the sky. i yelled to my friend, "whoa, look at that," and pointed to the object streaking toward us. at first i though the object was a meteor or something due to the speed it was coming toward us. but as it flew directly overhead, the object reflected the city lights and i could clearly see it was actually a rounded triangle, meaning the corners were rounded, not pointed. the object continued from the northeast to the southeast at a quick pace and was quickly out of site. the entire length the object was in my field of view was about six seconds. unfortunately my buddy, who was in front of me, thought i was yelling about something going on in the city below and didn't look up in time to see the object. the sighting was so quick that i couldn't properly gauge the object's size or elevation. it did fly directly over my head and i got an excellent look at the bottom side of the object. the object appeared to be solid and metallic and did not contain any type of navigation lights. it made absolutely no sound as it passed overhead. i was initially confused as to what the object may have been and my adrenaline was pumping. i stood in the area for a few more minutes to observe if any other objects came through, but nothing else happened.
content.summary: Rounded triangle flew directly overhead

content.detailedDescription:
around 2215-2230 on october 10, 2015 my boyfriend went outside out. we are in the country so being able to visualize the stars is normal. while he was looking up he noticed two lights that were flashing red/blue (this was a continuous flashing that never changed) and moving in tandem of each other. the movements were very precise. they went up, down, zig-zag, and sideways but always seemed to be in tandem. he brought me outside and i immediately saw the same thing. then i looked a different direction and saw another one. they were not planes, as there was no sound. there also isn’t any plane that could move like they did. then through some of the tree’s we noticed another one. when the objects were not moving but just hovering they had a little bounce or wiggle. if one object was moving a great deal it seemed the others stayed rather still. this went on for about an hour. then they just slowly started getting farther away and disappeared.
     the same thing occurred again the following night on october 11, 2015. the first 2 flashing red/blue lights we saw were in the exact same place, then we saw the third and it was in the exact same spot as the night before. there was less cloud cover this night and we saw two additional lights. these also seemed to move in tandem with each other. total, we saw 5 lights but expect that the single one probably had a tandem partner that we could not see. we watched again for close to an hour. when we went inside they were still there. when we woke the morning of october 12, 2015 at 0500 there were no lights that we could see. 
     we tried to obtain video but could not get anything. what we saw is similar to video we found online dating back to 2012/2013 of mysterious lights in the sky. 
      we don’t believe in aliens per se. however, something is going on in our skies. we are thinking the objects might be some sort of drone but the fact that is happened the exact same 2 nights in a row is disturbing. i don't think there was any reaction with our feelings other than just curiosity and some mild paranoia wondering if the government is doing something.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pairs of flashing lights moving in tandem in ways no plane can move and with no noise.

content.detailedDescription: Hi! i live in mandeville, la. on the morning of octobber 11,2015 around 4:15-4:30 i noticed a small meteor flashed across the sky so i decided to watch stars for awhile, around 4:50-5:05am i was looking at some stars when i saw one of the stars got really bright and made like a small hook moving upwards, it only lasted for approximately 5 seconds then disappeared. i don't know what the heck it was, we do have planes pass over but i know this wasn't no plane.
content.summary: I was with my girlfriend camping in the backyard with my autistic son and seen a light that got brighter fast and made a hook shape up briefly then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: When i wake up  and i get out of bed  a round 6:00.I take a look outside, i got 4 windows so i got a good view outside.Of its not cloudy i can see the stars .So this morning i see a very bright star (i see this star for a few weeks already) shining .So i get my binoculars and my cellphone.So i took some photos and watch it with my binoculars it was first a round shape  later it shapeshifted in triangle and round again.Thru the binoculars it was like small balls of light  together like a led bolt .Than i went outside into the garden thee i got a good view .When i take some photos again, i notice that underneed of the ufo was a cross shape like a x or a plus.At this time all the stars where gone  and it was daylight already.The ufo was still there and a round 15 min later it vanished. i think thats tommorow its comic back again. i try too take beter photos.
content.summary: Star like ufo keeps hovering at one spot

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to rowland high for coach norm revis memorial i was looking up 1 passing a mine i dug in the riverside mountains off the 60 fwy.
 when i saw three white spheres one bigger one two smaller ones. the bigger sphere was sitting still hovering while two fly around the bigger one , they all came together as one and started to fly away as this was happening i had my video camera going, it got 2 seconds and it cut off for no reason? , i got out of the car and continued video taping cause i did not know it was cut off ??? why?? but i got a photo of it as it flew by it was one craft now not three, they morphed into one i am not kidding !!!!! into what looked like a disc, it was as real as anything i have ever seen and it was not i repeat was not a drone, it was as big as a suv. i managed to get a little footage just enough to see it was there not a hoax...Folks i just wish they would have not messed with my camera ..

i had to repost because i blew up photos and could not add them to my sitting ?
content.summary: Morphing ufo three spheres chang to one and turn into a ringed disc. !!

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife was setting on orange beach about 1:00 am on 10/12/2015. to the west i seen 10-15 redish orange lights in the sky just off the beach over the water. at first i thought they were just helicopters or some other kind of aircraft. i told my wife to look and we both just stared in disbelief. they were moving very slowly to the south. they stayed visible for maybe 5 minutes until they started disappearing one by one until only three lights were left in the shape of a triangle, then they disappeared as well. my wife tried to take some pictures but was unable to capture them. i know what helicopters and airplane lights look like at night and these were definitely not any of those. we both have seen unexplainable things before but none like this.
content.summary: Seen 10-15 orbs of redish orange light

content.detailedDescription:
the sky was clear, the sun was shining, and there was quite a breeze on this particular day, october 2nd, 2015.
   i decided to open up the windows of the first floor of my home, and proceeded to open the back door. upon taking a step outside onto the patio, i took in the beautiful sky, observing some clouds to the north-west, the sun in a south-western orientation. directly to my west, and high up, to the left of the aforementioned clouds, i saw what looked like a star. i at first thought it was a plane reflecting the sun, many fly overhead so it seemed normal. however, after the initial sight of this object, i noticed it didn't move at all. the time was just after one in the afternoon, so i ruled out stars or a planet, as those would be difficult to see, if at all. satellites do not remain stationary, so i ruled this out as well. i was beginning to get anxious, as my camera was on the second floor, so i would need to quickly get it in order to document whatever this could be.

   i hesitantly ran to my room, after taking one stop in the kitchen to return to view the object, making sure it remained(and possibly getting my last view of whatever it could be). i made it back outside, and to my surprise the object was there, in the same spot. still keeping its star-like appearance, just shimmering up there, i began shooting. i did not have my tripod, so i used an outdoor shelf just to the left of the backdoor. i had to tilt the camera about 70-80 degrees, and shot as many photos as i could, deleting older photos off my cf card. 

   the sighting lasted about 30-35 minutes. i shot from 1:18pm to 1:33pm, with intermittent spurts of prior photo deletion. using my canon 50d camera, and my 70-300mm lens. i had to zoom as far as possible to get a shot, and even still it was only a speck on the frame. what struck me as odd was the fact that after deleting some older photos, i could no longer see the object with the naked eye, instead only through the camera. this confused and frightened me slightly, thinking that whatever i saw, could see me, and perhaps cloaked itself? speculation aside, there are many photos of something.

   i have been messing around with the raw shots, editing things such as contrast, shadow and sharpness to get the clearest possible image. i have many different types of shots. some show a boomerang shape of light, some show a circle of light surrounded by a halo. i'm not sure what to make of it, and would love someone to check them out and analyze! i have both the raw shots, as well as edited jpegs. in order to observe, the images need to be zoomed in to the max (pixelization is rampant). i also have more than allotted to post, available upon request.
content.summary: Star-like object stationary in sky; broad daylight

content.detailedDescription:
While reviewing security camera recording i saw what looked like four small lights that could have been connected in a square shape "appear" well above the tree line to the west of my home. my guess is that they were moving roughly west to east and possibly slightly up.

the lights "twinkled" or "pulsated" in a random pattern and seemed to be moving very slow toward the camera, cant judge how fast they were traveling but for the first minute or two it didn't get larger or smaller so assumed it was moving slow or hovering.

the lights then seemed to move up slowly and seemed to get smaller so i guessed they were moving away or up in direction, they eventually moved out of the cameras view.

my first thought was it was a helicopter but i've never seen one with that kind of light pattern and they usually have some kind of navigation lights which i could not see in this one.
content.summary: Saw what looked like 4 lights in a small square pattern "blink on" above tree line in security camera recording.

content.detailedDescription: Walking south back from corner store, kept glancing up at stars (i often do this), seen a bright flash by the star vega, i mentioned to my daughter and told her i've seen that before but always toward the north never in the west and that it was larger than i have seen. i usually see just a quick flash but this time it was a large and looked like a frisbee, brighter white circle in center, edges crisp. a plane very high up was moving ene not too far from it and then a few seconds later nw of vega another small quick flash, too small to make out shape etc. and my daughter seen that flash too. i, my husband and grandson have seen these flashes before but not this big and always in the north and never more than once in a short period of time. i could post many things i've seen in the sky where i live but this one is bugging me, might there be a logical explanation?  i'm hoping someone else besides family that sees this and maybe explain it away because i would not like to think that it would be related to flashes of lights some of us have seen in the past that have illuminated trees, people etc. and has scared the hell out of us.
content.summary: Bright flash next to the star vega

content.detailedDescription:
I first came to my husband to let him know the mufon site revealed 2 people had seen a ufo on the north side of elkhorn.  we live in that direction - northeast of elkhorn.  by then it was about 10 pm and we went out to see, also there were possible northern lights expected that night.  we saw either mars or mercury in the northern distance and suddenly i saw a blinking light. it blinked almost every 15-20 seconds and at the same time continued to move east (about the speed of a helicopter but no sound).  it was about the size of a basketball or larger.  it was a soft white light.

on a map we were about 10 miles due north of lake geneva. just south of east troy.
content.summary: West to east in in thin cloud on clear night slowly blinking

content.detailedDescription: Took out the sunday night trash at 11pm and smoked my cigarette at the entrance to my garage when all if the sudden i noticed a diamond shaped craft seemingly jump out of the sky/stars and pulsate in the night sky. i immediately felt extremely uncomfortable and thought maybe i caught the tail end of a very bright shooting star as the craft dissapeared, but within 10-15 seconda it reappeared even closer for about 8-10 seconds and grew much larger before skimming up towards the sky even higher. the craft seemed to look like the north star every time it would pulsate/vibrate to a stop before totally disappearing. then every 10-20 seconds it would reappear in a vibrating/pulsating bright glow and literally seemed to be mimicking the north star every time it stopped. it is an absolutely crystal clear night tonight and this experience just occurred a little over an hour ago. it seemed to be super high in the sky, like it was outside the atmosphere and as far away as the stars but it would appear very close at the same time. the craft appeared to be gigantic, diamond in shape that would glow with a vibrating white circular center and white edges that would become almost transparent. the entire event took about 3-5 mins to completely dodge above my roof/house and be out of sight. i felt extremely uncomfortable and still feel uncomfortable and shocked with goosebumps as i type this. during the experience, i saw a second object that mimicked the main object briefly before darting across the sky faster than anything i have ever seen. both objects moved quickly and slowly but faster than anything i have ever seen when they moved around the sky at high rates of speed. i did not see any of the typical man made objects in the sky (planes, satellites, helicopters,) during the experience, but did see them on their normal paths a few mins after the experience ended. i held my hand at during the experience to block the only light in my neighborhood that was on to make sure i had the best view possible and when the second object appeared my hand felt warm like i was holding it up to a distant fire or welders torch. i have never seen anything remotely like these objects in my entire 30 years and never felt the way i felt during this experience in my entire life. i still feel very uncomfortable and awkwyrd. i thought that there had to be an explanation and looked up online what did i just see in the night sky!? the space station website showed up and i filled out the information on my location and time and it was nowhere near me. i could not find one video online that even resembled what i saw and experienced and i felt overwhelmingly compelled to somehow report this experience. i work in a church and want to remain anonymous but had to share my experience. please offer any help, explanation, or insight that you can if possible. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Large diamond shaped pulsating craft - hovered, disappeared, reappeared, extremely bright

content.detailedDescription: Isee brief description
content.summary: Three lights two dimmer brightest on right all have a shadow like twin light on each side. emerging from east super bright light travels north.

content.detailedDescription: My hubby and i drive to work together. we saw a red circular object that "glowed" red traveling slowly but smoothly nw to west.  we both saw it, i had seen it before a year and a half prior.  they seem to come this time of year...It appeared to be trying to disappear because it flashed a couple times slowly as i got out my camera and then disappeared! of course i thought! now when i say "flashed" it was more like when something electrical is shorting out.  i know what a meteor, flashing airplane and helicopter looks like and this was none of those !  i know for a fact it was not any flying object known to man.
content.summary: Red circular object

content.detailedDescription: Isee brief description
content.summary: Three lights two dimmer brightest on right all have a shadow like twin light on each side. emerging from east super bright light travels north.

content.detailedDescription:
Got home from church and needed to take my dog for a short walk before i started to settle in for the evening.. it was before 8pm.. while walking the dog if the nights are clear i like to watch the skies for satellites, stars, meteors, planets etc etc.. i got to the stop sign at the end of my street (green dot in pic) and had noticed a lot of dogs barking off in the distance to the south.. enough so that my dog focused in on it and she does not always fixate on dogs barking.. 
normally we would make a left turn and cross the other side of the street and head back to the house.. my dog would not budge she was just fixated in that direction.. about that point i happened to notice a very deep red light sort of fuzzy.. probably less than 500 feet off the ground and appearing a short distance above the tree line.. 
at first i just blew it off as a tower light and then began to think there was no towers i know of in that direction.. it was about that time the light/object very slowly began to move in an easterly direction.. from my location it looked like it traveled the distance of the width of the street .. maybe two or three times that and took about 20 seconds doing so.. (pic position 1 to position 2). 

very suddenly it accelerated and quickly shot maybe about 100 yards further eastward (position 2 to 3 in pic) in about 2 seconds.. 
in that position it was starting to get behind some of the trees between myself and the object.. but still somewhat visible.. from there it appeared to make a sharp right turn 90 deg to the south, and or may have possibly descended a little.. hard to say for sure from where i was.. disappeared behind the tree line at that point.. watched for about 2 minutes over all but nothing further appeared.. the dogs at the far end of the road seemed to stop barking and my dog no longer fixated on that end of the road and wanted to continue her walk.. at that point i took notice of the time on my phone.. .. the sky was clear, maybe about 80 degf.. during the sighting when it first started to move because of the slow level short distance i almost thought someone may have been flying a drone.. until the sudden acceleration and distance it covered.. i have a couple small drones myself and am aware of how nimble they can be and with some of the lights am also aware they could be confused with other things.. 
it was just the apparent distance it covered in a short time and the odd color of the light, the possible angular turn  and the facts that i did not see it again and coupled with the dogs barking.. when i flew my small drones in my yard at night they look cool but they are hard to fly because of the night and all the challenges that presents.. but when i flew mine.. i would fly mine for more than just 1 or more minutes.. it is mostly open fields at the end of the road.. oil fields.. fenced in.. a lot of tall brush.. not some place you would want to fly or lose your fun toy for a chance no one would see it.. 

finished my walk came into the house and started this report.. 
looked at some light color charts and the color of the object was probably somewhere between 650 and 670 nano-meters on the attached color chart.. it was just an odd color..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Deep red fuzzy ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
The unknown object was filmed from 6:50 p.M. to 8:10 p.M.

the location of the fish farm can be found at these coordinates: 62°44'32.08" n   7°22'34.38" e (google earth).

in the last part of the video (video 6/6) (at 4:03 minutes), the unknown object can be seen flying slowly towards the north and is eventually lost behind a hilltop.

at times smaller objects (lights) can be seen.

the video camera had to be recharged at one point during the sighting.

note: the five other videos can be found on youtube.
channel: tvufofootage.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo filmed at fish farm in molde, norway – 7 october 2015
